personalInfo.bio: Cinephile, book lover, chess enthusiast, and always chasing for those green arrows in Fantasy Premier League! Continue scrolling, if you want to find out how a couple of mini projects, that were created for the sole purpose of self-promotion, have totally changed the world!

projects.title: MovieVault
projects.description: MovieVault is a feature-rich web application for movie enthusiasts. It allows users to discover, rate, review and discuss movies and TV shows. The platform combines personal curation with community interaction, featuring detailed media information, user reviews, watchlists, real-time discussions, and an AI-powered movie assistant for personalized recommendations and insights.

projects.title: Chess Buddy
projects.description: Chess Buddy is a web application designed to connect chess players locally. It allows users to find nearby players on a map, view their profiles, and engage in real-time chat conversations.
